sentences.english: When it comes to decay, Streptococcus mutans is the bacterial strain that does the most damage.
sentences.chinese: 当发生龋齿，链球菌在破坏中起到主要作用。

sentences.english: For dental caries pain, cold evil wind, toothache, headache with and hemi.
sentences.chinese: 适用于龋齿疼痛，怕冷恶风，牙痛连及半侧头痛者。

sentences.english: Add to this the fluoride that people get from toothpaste and cavities are not normally a problem.
sentences.chinese: 添加人们从牙膏中获取的氟元素，龋齿自然不成问题。

sentences.english: Conclusion These results suggested that caries in children of 3-4 years are closely related with MS acquisition.
sentences.chinese: 结论儿童龋齿与变链菌的早期获得密切相关。

sentences.english: A cavity forms when the tooth decay breaks through the enamel to the underlying layers of the tooth.
sentences.chinese: 当蛀坏到突破了牙釉质层，龋齿就形成。

sentences.english: Harry aced out with only one cavity.
sentences.chinese: 哈里交了好运，发现只有一颗龋齿。

sentences.english: Do you or your family members get cavities frequently?
sentences.chinese: 你和你的家人经常患有龋齿吗？

sentences.english: The properties of the amalgams of spherical powders, such as dimension change during hardening…
sentences.chinese: 临床观察也表明球粉汞齐修复龋齿效果良好。

sentences.english: Dental research has identified factors that increase your risk of getting decay.
sentences.chinese: 牙科研究发现一些增加龋齿风险的一些因素。

sentences.english: OBJECTIVE To investigate the incidence of dental caries among high school students Hengyang.
sentences.chinese: 目的探讨衡阳市实验中学学生龋齿患病的影响因素。

sentences.english: Dental caries and mottled enamel are inverse ratio.
sentences.chinese: 氟牙症和龋齿的病情呈反比关系。

sentences.english: Conclusion This self - made pit and fissure sealant has significant preventive effect on carious teeth.
sentences.chinese: 结论该窝沟封闭剂具有明显的龋齿预防效果。

sentences.english: Results The carious rate of test group was lower than the control.
sentences.chinese: 结果实验组龋齿发病率明显小于对照组。

definition: caries/rotten tooth (colloquial)/see also 齲齒|龋齿[qu3 chi3]
permanent tooth (as opposed to deciduous tooth 乳牙)/adult tooth
